trans-unit.source: When set to true, this property ensures that database-wide properties cannot be overridden by system-wide properties.

seg-source.mrk: When set to true, this property ensures that database-wide properties cannot be overridden by system-wide properties.

target.mrk: When set to true, this property ensures that database-wide properties cannot be overridden by system-wide properties.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to false, or not set, database-wide properties can be overridden by system-wide properties (see "Precedence of properties" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>).

seg-source.mrk: When this property is set to false, or not set, database-wide properties can be overridden by system-wide properties (see "Precedence of properties" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>).

target.mrk: When this property is set to false, or not set, database-wide properties can be overridden by system-wide properties (see "Precedence of properties" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>).

trans-unit.source: This property ensures that a database's environment cannot be modified by the environment in which it is booted.

seg-source.mrk: This property ensures that a database's environment cannot be modified by the environment in which it is booted.

target.mrk: This property ensures that a database's environment cannot be modified by the environment in which it is booted.

trans-unit.source: This property can never be overridden by system properties.

seg-source.mrk: This property can never be overridden by system properties.

target.mrk: This property can never be overridden by system properties.

trans-unit.source: This property is dynamic; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately. For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

seg-source.mrk: This property is dynamic; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

target.mrk: This property is dynamic; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.
